TEXT.S:
dadiw nu sulda atu lamal(Amilika: A Song of Ice and Fire), u nisangaan nu misulitay ci George Raymond Richard Martin, u kungku nu nilalamelan nu laylay atu malawlaay nadatengan. izaw ku pituay a punu ulic nu nida. malagiki nu HBO i 2011 a mihcaan. (Amilika a kamu: House of Baratheon) u idang( izang) nu inaay a tademaw sa, u wawana nu mekeliday nu bandanbangan, u pucuday a kaka ni Ekun ci Malpacaway. i Nabalulucu'an a malpacawan sa, mipatay tu i sadikuday a mikeliday ci Alcila, pabelien ci Ekun i ci Aliw hananay. namakatukuh tu i Elis ci milibaki sa, napademec tu i laluma'an nu Stak acu laluma'an nu Alin sananay. sisa, malamikeliday namakayda. daw( izaw) ku makeliday a laluma'an sa, u laluma'an nu Panlus, laluma'an nu Talan, laluma'an nu Baleyliong. u multi nu heni sa, u situpelay a macelahay a ngabul kamu nu heni: nabalucu'an nu mita.( Amilika a kamu: ours is the fury.)
laylay nu laluma'an nu Palatiyun u sasabaay a laluma'an nu pituway a knatal, u laylay nu heni namakay i tulu a lasubu a mihcan hananay, ci Awlis ku malingatuway, u sasakapahayay a hitay ni Ekun Takelian, malecaday ku wama sakyami.
micidekay atu lalangawan ayda a kasahenulay a tademaw tu laluma'an nu Palatiyun Lop palatiyung Stanis Palatiyung Lanli Palatiyung Silin Palatiyung malalitin tu ihekaay atu zumaay a natinengan nasulitan ni Padakaw Lami' 2019.
u Wipsay nu misulitay ci Georgr RR Martin manamuhay a Wikipayke dadiw nu sulda atu lamal
